meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Menyanthes, especially M. trifoliata, with white or pink flowers.
meanings.sent1: The buckbean grew near the pond.
meanings.sent2: The buckbean plant added beauty to the garden.
meanings.sent3: The buckbean plant seemed to wave hello in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: The buckbean stood out like a star among the greenery.
meanings.sent5: The delicate buckbean flowers danced in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The bitter-tasting leaves of the buckbean plant, used in herbal medicine.
meanings.sent1: She brewed a tea with buckbean leaves.
meanings.sent2: The herbalist collected buckbean for its medicinal properties.
meanings.sent3: The bitter buckbean leaves made her pucker comically.
meanings.sent4: In the world of herbs, buckbean was a warrior against ailments.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of buckbean filled the room with healing power.
